  1. Welcome to the OAI Track! [1]

Welcome to the OAI Track! Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: Welcome to the OAI Track & Welcome New OpenAPI Versions

(3) Join the OAI/OpenAPI Community!

  • Join the community: github.com/OAI/community [https://github.com/OAI/community]
  • All technical and special interest groups meetings: openapis.org/calendar [https://www.openapis.org/calendar]
  • Upcoming events (including OAI Tracks): openapis.org/events [https://www.openapis.org/events]


Welcome New OpenAPI Versions!

Outline (Welcome New OpenAPI Versions!)

  1. Welcome to the OAI Track! [1]
  2. Welcome New OpenAPI Versions! [1]
Welcome New OpenAPI Versions! Erik Wilde, OAI Ambassador: Welcome to the OAI Track & Welcome New OpenAPI Versions

(5) Main Versions of OpenAPI

  • December 2015: 2.0 [https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v2.0.html] (previously Swagger 2.0)
  • July 2017: 3.0 [https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0.html]
  • February 2021: 3.1 [https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.0.html]
  • September 2025: 3.2 [https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.2.0.html]
